dcterms:description: A dataset containing over one thousand CT images which equates to roughly 240,000 2D slices, curated from 12 medical centers, including multi-phase, multi-vendor, and multi-disease cases. Segmentation masks for liver, kidney, spleen, and pancreas are provided, but labels are ignored during self-supervised pre-training.
dcterms:title: Abdomen-1K

dcterms:creator: H. Tang
X. Liu
S. Sun
X. Yan
X. Xie
dcterms:description: An abdomen dataset containing 110 CT images from patients with various abdominal tumors, taken during the treatment planning stage. The dataset is used for evaluating segmentation performance on 11 abdominal organs.
dcterms:title: ABD-110

dcterms:description: A thorax dataset containing 85 thoracic CT images used for evaluating segmentation performance on 6 thoracic organs.
dcterms:title: Thorax-85

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 120 CT images covering the head and neck region, used for evaluating segmentation performance on 9 organs.
dcterms:title: HaN
